description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Illustrated Handbook to Bakewell & its vicinity. A day in the Peak: being a brief description of Bakewell Church, Haddon Hall, and Chatsworth, etc" Author: COCKAYNE, Andreas Edward. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10347.b.22.(9.)" Page: 100 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1886 Publisher: Simpkin, Marshall & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000732977 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
